plan_state.goal: Identify the central themes involved in the Cyberpunk 2077 video game

steps.description: Research the game's storyline and characters to understand the context
Analyze reviews and critic feedback from the game's release to identify recurring themes
Consult fan communities and online forums to gather insights on the game's themes
Review the game's official marketing materials and developer statements to confirm findings
